thread.section_title: Lifebroker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lifebroker | www.lifebroker.com.au
thread.title: Aman K.

author: Aman K.
title: Aman K.
text:
Chris Anderson has been amazing to deal with. I had made a call to get information on 'income protect' and 'critical illness cover' and Chris was so patient will all the questions I had and was very prompt in getting back with my Quote: s. He was so efficient in carrying out a pre-assessment check of my medical history with 7 of the insurance companies to try to get the best deal for me. Prior to calling,
Chris made the entire process so simple and I would recommend anyone interest that has limited idea on the insurance they require to contact him as he is extremely helpful
